code:
import numpy as np

def construct_packing():
    centers = []
    radii = []
    
    # Corner circles (4 circles, r ≈ 0.0858)
    r_corner = 0.0858
    corners = [
        (r_corner, r_corner),
        (1 - r_corner, r_corner),
        (r_corner, 1 - r_corner),
        (1 - r_corner, 1 - r_corner)
    ]
    centers.extend(corners)
    radii.extend([r_corner] * 4)
    
    # Edge circles (12 circles, r ≈ 0.0715)
    r_edge = 0.0715
    # Bottom edge
    centers.extend([
        (0.25, r_edge),
        (0.5, r_edge),
        (0.75, r_edge)
    ])
    # Top edge
    centers.extend([
        (0.25, 1 - r_edge),
        (0.5, 1 - r_edge),
        (0.75, 1 - r_edge)
    ])
    # Left edge
    centers.extend([
        (r_edge, 0.25),
        (r_edge, 0.5),
        (r_edge, 0.75)
    ])
    # Right edge
    centers.extend([
        (1 - r_edge, 0.25),
        (1 - r_edge, 0.5),
        (1 - r_edge, 0.75)
    ])
    radii.extend([r_edge] * 12)
    
    # Interior circles - 3x3 grid + 1 (10 circles, r ≈ 0.074)
    r_interior = 0.074
    
    # 3x3 grid
    grid_positions = [
        (0.33, 0.33),
        (0.5, 0.33),
        (0.67, 0.33),
        (0.33, 0.5),
        (0.5, 0.5),
        (0.67, 0.5),
        (0.33, 0.67),
        (0.5, 0.67),
        (0.67, 0.67)
    ]
    centers.extend(grid_positions)
    radii.extend([r_interior] * 9)
    
    # One additional interior circle
    centers.append((0.5, 0.4))
    radii.append(r_interior)
    
    centers = np.array(centers)
    radii = np.array(radii)
    sum_radii = np.sum(radii)
    
    return centers, radii, sum_radii

def run_packing():
    return construct_packing()

import numpy as np

def construct_packing():
    centers = []
    radii = []
    
    # Corner circles (4 circles, r ≈ 0.0858)
    r_corner = 0.0858
    corners = [
        (r_corner, r_corner),
        (1 - r_corner, r_corner),
        (r_corner, 1 - r_corner),
        (1 - r_corner, 1 - r_corner)
    ]
    centers.extend(corners)
    radii.extend([r_corner] * 4)
    
    # Edge circles (12 circles, r ≈ 0.0715)
    r_edge = 0.0715
    # Bottom edge
    centers.extend([
        (0.25, r_edge),
        (0.5, r_edge),
        (0.75, r_edge)
    ])
    # Top edge
    centers.extend([
        (0.25, 1 - r_edge),
        (0.5, 1 - r_edge),
        (0.75, 1 - r_edge)
    ])
    # Left edge
    centers.extend([
        (r_edge, 0.25),
        (r_edge, 0.5),
        (r_edge, 0.75)
    ])
    # Right edge
    centers.extend([
        (1 - r_edge, 0.25),
        (1 - r_edge, 0.5),
        (1 - r_edge, 0.75)
    ])
    radii.extend([r_edge] * 12)
    
    # Interior circles - 3x3 grid + 1 (10 circles, r ≈ 0.074)
    r_interior = 0.074
    
    # 3x3 grid
    grid_positions = [
        (0.33, 0.33),
        (0.5, 0.33),
        (0.67, 0.33),
        (0.33, 0.5),
        (0.5, 0.5),
        (0.67, 0.5),
        (0.33, 0.67),
        (0.5, 0.67),
        (0.67, 0.67)
    ]
    centers.extend(grid_positions)
    radii.extend([r_interior] * 9)
    
    # One additional interior circle
    centers.append((0.5, 0.4))
    radii.append(r_interior)
    
    centers = np.array(centers)
    radii = np.array(radii)
    sum_radii = np.sum(radii)
    
    return centers, radii, sum_radii

def run_packing():
    return construct_packing()
